title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING AND ADOPTING THE MUNICIPAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. 2025-12, DATED NOVEMBER 17,2025, ENTITLED ‚ÄùRESOLUTION REALIGNING THE BALANCES AND UNUTILIZED APPROPRIATIONS OF THE MUNICIPAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT FUND CURRENT APPROPRIATION CY 2025 AMOUNTING TO TWO MILLION FOUR HUNDRED FORTY-NINE THOUSAND EIGHT HUNDRED SIX PESOS AND 13/100 ( PHP 2,449,806.13) AND REVERSION OF CONTINUING APPROPRIATIONS AMOUNTING TO FIVE HUNDRED THIRTY-THREE THOUSAND SEVEN HUNDRED TWENTY PESOS AND 00/100 (PHP533,720.00) FOR VARIOUS PURPOSES AND APPROVING THE SAME AS SUPPLEMENTAL INVESTMENT PLAN. --------------------------------------- i e Author Co-Author
